title: ReAct Agent LLM Output Schema
description: Defines the expected JSON structure for the LLM response in the ReAct loop.

Thought.description: The reasoning process, analysis, and plan that leads to the chosen action.

Action.description: The name of the tool/skill to be executed next.

Action Input.description: A JSON object containing the required parameters for the selected Action. For 'final_answer', this should be {'answer': '...'}.
